scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" "cd ./backend/chatirumae && gradlew.bat bootRun" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:debug: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --raw "cd ./backend/chatirumae && gradlew.bat bootRun --info" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
